mapper.sql: ID, NAME, ADDRESS, EXPECT_RENT, VR_PATH, THUMBNAIL_PATH, COMMUNITY_ID, FLOOR, LAYOUT_ID, DECORATION_TYPE_ID, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, HAVE_KITCKEN, HAVE_BALCONY, HOUSE_STATUS_ID, ENABLED, EXPECT_PAYMENT_ID
mapper.insert: insert into HOUSE (ID, NAME, ADDRESS, EXPECT_RENT, VR_PATH, THUMBNAIL_PATH, COMMUNITY_ID, FLOOR, LAYOUT_ID, DECORATION_TYPE_ID, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, HAVE_KITCKEN, HAVE_BALCONY, HOUSE_STATUS_ID, ENABLED, EXPECT_PAYMENT_ID,AREA_NUMBER ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectRent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vrPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnailPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{layoutId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{decorationTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{haveKitcken,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{haveBalcony,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{houseStatusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{expectPaymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{areaNumber,jdbcType=DOUBLE} )

insert into HOUSE
ID,
NAME,
ADDRESS,
EXPECT_RENT,
VR_PATH,
THUMBNAIL_PATH,
COMMUNITY_ID,
FLOOR,
LAYOUT_ID,
DECORATION_TYPE_ID,
PROVINCE_ID,
CITY_ID,
AREA_ID,
HAVE_KITCKEN,
HAVE_BALCONY,
HOUSE_STATUS_ID,
ENABLED,
EXPECT_PAYMENT_ID,
AREA_NUMBER,

mapper.update:
update HOUSE
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPECT_RENT = #{expectRent,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
VR_PATH = #{vrPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THUMBNAIL_PATH = #{thumbnailPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLOOR = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAYOUT_ID = #{layoutId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DECORATION_TYPE_ID = #{decorationTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HAVE_KITCKEN = #{haveKitcken,jdbcType=TINYINT},
HAVE_BALCONY = #{haveBalcony,jdbcType=TINYINT},
HOUSE_STATUS_ID = #{houseStatusId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT},
EXPECT_PAYMENT_ID = #{expectPaymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AREA_NUMBER = #{areaNumber,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update HOUSE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPECT_RENT = #{expectRent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, VR_PATH = #{vrPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THUMBNAIL_PATH = #{thumbnailPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLOOR = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAYOUT_ID = #{layoutId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DECORATION_TYPE_ID = #{decorationTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HAVE_KITCKEN = #{haveKitcken,jdbcType=TINYINT}, HAVE_BALCONY = #{haveBalcony,jdbcType=TINYINT}, HOUSE_STATUS_ID = #{houseStatusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, EXPECT_PAYMENT_ID = #{expectPaymentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AREA_NUMBER=#{areaNumber,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT HOUSE.ID, HOUSE.NAME, HOUSE.EXPECT_RENT, COMMUNITY.ID community_ID, COMMUNITY.NAME, HOUSE.FLOOR, HOUSE.ROOM, DECORATION_TYPE.NAME, AREA.areaID, AREA.areaName, HOUSE.HAVE_KITCKEN, HOUSE.HAVE_BALCONY, HOUSE_STATUS.STATUS_NAME, HOUSE.ENABLED, RENT_MODE.ID rentMODE_ID, RENT_MODE.NAME FROM HOUSE JOIN AREA ON HOUSE.AREA_ID = AREA.areaID JOIN COMMUNITY ON HOUSE.COMMUNITY_ID = COMMUNITY.ID JOIN DECORATION_TYPE ON HOUSE.DECORATION_TYPE_ID = DECORATION_TYPE.ID JOIN HOUSE_STATUS ON HOUSE.HOUSE_STATUS_ID = HOUSE_STATUS.ID JOIN HOUSE_RENT_MODE ON HOUSE.ID = HOUSE_RENT_MODE.HOUSE_ID JOIN RENT_MODE ON HOUSE_RENT_MODE.RENT_MODE_ID = RENT_MODE.ID WHERE COMMUNITY.NAME=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HOUSE.ENABLED > 0

SELECT HOUSE.ID, HOUSE.NAME, HOUSE.FLOOR, HOUSE.EXPECT_RENT, HOUSE.AREA_NUMBER, HOUSE.HAVE_KITCKEN, HOUSE.HAVE_BALCONY, PROVINCE.provinceName, CITY.cityName, AREA.areaName, COMMUNITY.NAME community_Name, HOUSE_LAYOUT.NAME layout_Name, DECORATION_TYPE.NAME decorationType_Name, HOUSE_STATUS.STATUS_NAME houseStatus_Name, PAYMENT.PAYMENT_NAME PAYMENT_Name, RENT_MODE.NAME rentMODE_Name, ROOMS.ID room_ID, ROOMS.ROOM_NO, ROOMS.AREA_NUMBER, ROOMS.HAVE_KITCKEN, ROOMS.HAVE_WASHROOM FROM HOUSE JOIN PROVINCE ON HOUSE.PROVINCE_ID = PROVINCE.provinceID JOIN CITY ON HOUSE.CITY_ID = CITY.cityID JOIN AREA ON HOUSE.AREA_ID = AREA.areaID JOIN COMMUNITY ON HOUSE.COMMUNITY_ID = COMMUNITY.ID JOIN HOUSE_LAYOUT ON HOUSE.LAYOUT_ID = HOUSE_LAYOUT.ID JOIN DECORATION_TYPE ON HOUSE.DECORATION_TYPE_ID = DECORATION_TYPE.ID JOIN HOUSE_STATUS ON HOUSE.HOUSE_STATUS_ID = HOUSE_STATUS.ID JOIN PAYMENT ON HOUSE.EXPECT_PAYMENT_ID = PAYMENT.ID JOIN HOUSE_RENT_MODE ON HOUSE.ID = HOUSE_RENT_MODE.HOUSE_ID JOIN RENT_MODE ON HOUSE_RENT_MODE.RENT_MODE_ID = RENT_MODE.ID JOIN ROOMS ON HOUSE.ID = ROOMS.HOUSE_ID WHERE HOUSE.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
